err: An issue occurred, failed to proceed.
login_checkpoint: Checkpoint appeared, use the authentication code to continue.
login_checkpoint_verify_err: Checkpoint failed, your Facebook account might be suspended.
login_email_blank: Do not leave the email empty.
login_password_blank: Do not leave the password empty.
unsupported_device: Device not supported by this program.
rip_err: Cannot post on the target profile.
input_profile_id: Don't leave the profile id empty
input_num_loop: Do not enter a number less than or equal to zero
set_lang_not_found:
Language not found or [?] is not available. Available languages:
 @
set_default_login_arg_not_found: Command ? not found. Only available: manual, cookie_login
login_save_device_err: Failed to save the browser, but login successful.
profile_create_new_post_text_blank: Do not leave the text empty
banner_login_desc: Login account using email and password
banner_rip_spam_desc: Spam posts with the hashtag RIP (#RIP) on a target's profile
banner_report_user_desc: Report the target account as a fake account
banner_report_post_desc: Report a post using the post url
banner_set_default_login_desc: Setting the default login when using the 'login' command. (For example, set_default_login cookie_login) [cookie_login, manual]
banner_set_checkpoint_desc: Set the checkpoint session, whether to continue or skip it (For example, if a checkpoint appears when logging in, you are prompted to enter a verification code to continue) default [checkpoint=noskip] [skip,noskip]
banner_set_lang_desc: Sets the program language (eg set_lang en_EN)
